main event: A witness reported observing a bright, disk-shaped object with flashing lights hovering in the sky over New York, New York on August 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 30 feet in diameter and was observed for a period of approximately 2-3 minutes.
The object remained stationary for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from view.
Investigators were dispatched to the reported location to conduct a field investigation, but no physical trace evidence was found at the scene.
Weather conditions at the time were clear, with limited cloud cover.
This incident has been properly documented and investigated in accordance with Project Blue Book procedures.
sighted object: a bright, disk-shaped object with flashing lights
